item.title: Site to Site VPN for Google Kubernetes Engine
item.description: In this tutorial I will try to explain you briefly and concisely how you can set up a site-to-site VPN for the Google Cloud Network. Prerequisites We need 2 virtual machines. The first one on the side of our office and the other one on the side of Google. Setup OpenVPN Clients Site-to-Site Client Office Side We need to install OpenVPN, we do it as follows: apt install openvpn -y After that we add our OpenVPN configuration under this path /etc/openvpn/s2s.
